rename.from: Bug: Option ignoreConstructors of object-shortnad does not work for prototype's constructor property
rename.to: Bug: Option ignoreConstructors of object-shorthand does not work for prototype's constructor property

rename.from: Bug: Option ignoreConstructors of object-shorthand does not work for prototype's constructor property
rename.to: Bug: Option ignoreConstructors of object-shorthand doesn't ignore prototype's constructor property

body:
Hi @marcelschork, thanks for the issue!

> So the rule should not only ignore uppercase functions names but also the lowercase constructor property when the option ignoreConstructors is set.

Makes sense to me. It seems reasonable to assume that functions that are value of a property named `constructor` will be used as constructors (i.e., with `new`).

I also think we can treat this as a bug fix because the `ignoreConstructors` option does not disallow the concise method form, so updating the logic to include more constructor-like names can only produce fewer warnings.

I'm in favor of making this change, but would like to hear the opinions of other team members.
Oops! It looks like we lost track of this issue. What do we want to do here? This issue will auto-close in 7 days without an update.

This seems like a case that ignoreConstructors wasn’t intended to handle. I might be inclined to add a new ignorePrototypeConstructors option or else change the ignoreConstructors option to be a string that can be “all”, “capitalized”, “prototype”, where true is the same as “capitalized”

It would be best to add a generic option that accepts a regex. Properties whose name matches the regex and value is a function would be ignored. This would avoid having built-in assumptions on what names correspond to functions that will be used as constructors (or used in any other way for which the differences between function expressions and methods might be important).
That works for me. Do you have a proposal for that new option’s name?

> Do you have a proposal for that new option’s name?

Maybe `functionsIgnorePattern`?

issue.title: feat: add `methodsIgnorePattern` option to object-shorthand rule
